urls.title: John Innes Centre scientists call for international investment to tackle major wheat losses

urls.title: Guest blog - The Cultural Landscape in the Anthropocene by Karen Lloyd - Mark Avery
urls.description: Karen Lloyd is the author of Abundance: Nature in Recovery, published by Bloomsbury in September 2021, and the award-winning author of The Gathering Tide; A Journey Around the Edgelands of Morecambe Bay and The Blackbird Diaries, both published by Saraband. She is an environmental activist and produced and edited the Curlew Calling Anthology to raise funds for curlew conservation. She is Lancaster University’s ‘Literature, Landscape and Environment’ scholar and ‘Future Places’ Writer in Residence.
